Package it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionRequestController
    A specialized request controller used to handle action requests.
    BoardRequestController
    A specialized request controller used to handle board requests.
    EffectRequestController
    A specialized request controller used to handle weapon effect requests.
    GameController
    The controller used to handle the game screen, responsible of updating the information rendered in all the custom controls according to data retrieved from the ModelManager.
    GUIRenderer
    A specialized class implementing the UIRenderer interface that provides methods to render content in a GUI environment
    ImageViewerController
    A controller used to manage windows where an image is shown
    LeaderboardController
    The controller for the window showing the final scores and the match leaderboard.
    LobbyController
    A controller used to handle the lobby scene, providing information about The players connected to the game Whether the match is starting soon or not
    LoginController
    A controller used to handle the login scene.
    PlayerOperationRequestController
    A specialized request controller used to handle player operation requests.
    PlayerRequestController
    A specialized request controller used to handle player requests.
    PowerupRequestController
    A specialized request controller used to handle powerup requests.
    RequestController<T extends Serializable>
    An abstract class representing a GUIController that is responsible of managing windows used to select something when performing a request
    SelectionHandler<T extends Serializable>
    A class describing an object handling the selection of a certain object to reply to choice requests
    SkullsRequestController
    A specialized request controller used to handle skulls requests.
    WeaponCardRequestController
    A specialized request controller used to handle weapon requests.
